projects.title: Simulating Wildlife Using AI Techniques
projects.description: Written in C++, this project researches and explores what is needed to accurately simulate animal behaviour. It consider different decision making processes to switch between behaviours and how to replicate realistic animal reproduction to produce better offspring using genetic algorithms. It addresses problems such as O(n^2) boid checks and implements a possible solution. The application implements fuzzy logic and finite state machines to create boids that analyse their surroundings and apply the correct behaviours in a realistic way.

projects.title: Tipping Tower
projects.description: Given 48 hours I had to create a fun and simple game that in incorporates gambling. Written in Javascript Tipping Tower is a simple game where the aim is to build your tower up to your target level to win money, with higher targets having higher odds.

projects.title: Photo Slider IOS
projects.description: A simple tile sliding app written in objective-C for IOS, that allow the users to use their own photos and compete against each other to complete a board in the fastest time with the fewest moves.
